title: things to look out for this year in league. (repost)
body:
[](http://images.clipartpanda.com/smiley-face-thumbs-up-clipart-dTre6KXT9.jpeg)

Based on how this year has gone so far I think that a list like this should be made so that everyone can see what good things I predict will happen this year.

Twisted Treeline is getting removed because not enough people play Twisted Treeline.

Bots Getting removed because not enough players play bots.

League of legends no longer featuring a tutorial, because its hard on their system to keep running it when so few people actually play it. and besides the best way to learn is to play.

More buffs directed at assassins.

More Direct nerfs for tanks in all positions.

wards are getting removed because they are considered unhealthy for the game.

minions no longer give exp to characters that didn't last hit it, so that carries can get their levels faster.

because wards have been removed lee's dash is now just a point and click dash, and his q now does % current health on the skill shot.

a new item that is rageblade plus a recurve bow, it also increases ad and crit every hit as well.

vayne has not seen enough play recently so they are going to buff her and add another 12 percent to her true every third auto.

illaoi is not in a good enough spot, so their going to add an additional 40% of her damage as magic damage on every ability.

ao shin is being delayed until late 2017

yoricks rework has been canceled and yorick has been removed from the game.

Taric's rework has been canceled.

cass is the design standard for mages now, every mage has a stacking passive.

mordekaiser is considered unhealthy so long as he is on summoners rift. he is currently auto banned in everything but aram.

Urf mode is back, but you need to pay 1031 rp every time you want to play it.

Ranked is the now the only queue, because supporting other queue's takes resources they can use in better places.

Custom games have been removed because the best way to get better is to play the normal game.

new special game modes based increasing one stat per game mode, wait for next month's +15% movespeed game mode.

every skin released will all be crammed into one splash art so that riot can focus more on making quality in game models instead of working on splash arts.

More unnecessary buffs to random champions.

More reflex nerfs on anything that happens to counter what riot wants as meta as soon as it happens.

Skarner has been removed from the game.

Urgot will probably be seen in lcs again. for one game. and then he will be nerfed.

because rek'sai uses the old capture animations, she will get removed from the game so that riot can allocate more effort into a more quality game.

Cinderhulk isn't helping tanks enough, so their going to make a new item, and then nerf it and every tank that could use it.

Runic echoes isn't what they are looking for for ap junglers, so that's getting phased out for a new ap jungle item.

ad items and item buffs galore.

What a good year to play league of legends, I'm so excited for these things to happen.

replies.body: Actually, a lot of people play bots. A lot of people.
They're taking Dominion. Why not take everything else as well? Is this even League anymore?
Honestly, I wouldn't be surprised if half of these changes were actually made...
